page.title: 12Employment.
page.content:
{Barlow and Hodgkinson}is a haulage firm which was set up in Biggin to {transport the lime produced in the {area. They have 36 lorries _ all 8 wheel Foden trucks. They have 24 tippers and 12 tankers which all run on deisel. They transport stone, sand, flint and all lime products and they travel as far as the south coast of England and north to Scotland. Barlow and Hodgkinson's employ{36 {lorry drivers, 6 mechanics and 3 {office staff}but only 6 of the employees live in Biggin.
Many people work locally eg. in various quarries, brick works and the cheese factory but these are not within our area. Others are employed on the farms.
